snippet.title: Red Metal Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Red Metal! Get ready to drive into high-speed vehicular combat in this 3D action roguelite.

Fuel Up. Fight Back.

In Red Metal, momentum is your weapon and speed is your shield. Engage in adrenaline-pumping physics-based combat against hordes of mutants and robots.

Key Features:

•    Physics-Based Vehicles: Harness the power of momentum to deal maximum damage.
•    Upgrades & Mods: Customize your car with tons of powerful upgrades and weapon mods.
•    Horde Mode: Mow down thousands of enemies in epic, high-speed combat.

Wishlist now and fight for humanity's future!


Wishlisth Red Metal on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/2741160/Red_Metal/
Follow on social media:
https://www.youtube.com/@SilentFactoryGames

#indiedev
